thread.title: BRIEF-Village Roadshow Expects HY ‍Results To Be Lower Than Prior Comparable Period​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Village Roadshow Expects HY ‍Results To Be Lower Than Prior Comparable Period​
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Village Roadshow Ltd:
* 2 MAIN DIVISIONS- THEME PARKS AND CINEMA EXHIBITION, EXPERIENCED CHALLENGING TRADING CONDITIONS IN FIRST 6 MONTHS TO 31 DEC 2017​
* ‍RESULTS FOR HY EXPECTED TO BE SUBSTANTIALLY BELOW PRIOR COMPARABLE PERIOD​
* ‍EXPECTS FY18 ATTRIBUTABLE NPAT BEFORE MATERIAL ITEMS AND DISCONTINUED OPERATIONS TO BE IN RANGE OF $12 MILLION - $17 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
